extension.description: Watch an 10 hour long HD video of a fireplace.
extension.disclaimer: The authors of this addon do not host any of the content found or have any affiliation with the content providers. This add-on only scrapes web pages.

extension.description:
Watch cartoons and anime from [COLOR orange][B]www.wcofun.tv[/B][/COLOR].
Support the WatchCartoonOnline website with a PayPal donation to: [COLOR khaki][B]wcohelp@yandex.com[/B][/COLOR]
Add-on originally by doko. Random updates by lolage.
extension.disclaimer: The authors of this addon do not host any of the content found or have any affiliation with the content providers. This add-on only scrapes web pages.
extension.news:
[COLOR orange][B]WatchNixtoons2[/B][/COLOR] - Cartoons & Anime [B]0.12.1:[/B] - Update User Agent - Update Thumbnail Hashes
[B]0.12.0:[/B] - Code clean-up and restructure - allow for different site profiles - add wcostream.tv domain as option - add premium video work around for wcostream - modify resolver for wcostream - change default setting form popular thumbnails to true - Update User Agent - Update Thumbnail Hashes
[B]0.11.6:[/B] - add wcofun.org in old domain list
